alert.note: Alert for Ralls (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 24 at 11:28AM CDT until further notice by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri...Illinois... Mississippi River at Winfield. Mississippi River at Quincy. Mississippi River at Lock & Dam 21. Mississippi River at LaGrange. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri...Illinois... Mississippi River at Clarksville. Mississippi River at Hannibal. Mississippi River at Louisiana. Mississippi River at Saverton. Mississippi River at Canton. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Saverton. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 19.6 feet, The north end of Saverton Road begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CDT Monday the stage was 14.8 feet. - Bankfull stage is 16.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow evening and continue rising to 19.7 feet Sunday morning. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7:00 am) Location Stg Stage Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat Mississippi River Saverton 16.0 14.8 15.6 16.3 17.1 18.0 18.9 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
